{0: -2.2, 1: 1, -1: 1}-1

{0: -2.2, 1: 1, -1: 1}

\documentclass[border=2px]{standalone}

\usepackage[braket, qm]{qcircuit}
\usepackage{graphicx}

\begin{document}
\scalebox{1.0}{
\Qcircuit @C=1.0em @R=1.0em @!R { \\
	 	\nghost{{q}_{0} :  } & \lstick{{q}_{0} :  } & \qw & \qw\\
	 	\nghost{{q}_{1} :  } & \lstick{{q}_{1} :  } & \qw & \qw\\
	 	\nghost{{q}_{2} :  } & \lstick{{q}_{2} :  } & \qw & \qw\\
\\ }}
\end{document}

\documentclass[border=2px]{standalone}

\usepackage[braket, qm]{qcircuit}
\usepackage{graphicx}

\begin{document}
\scalebox{1.0}{
\Qcircuit @C=1.0em @R=1.0em @!R { \\
	 	\nghost{{q}_{0} :  } & \lstick{{q}_{0} :  } & \qw & \qw\\

U_b
\documentclass[border=2px]{standalone}

\usepackage[braket, qm]{qcircuit}
\usepackage{graphicx}

\begin{document}
\scalebox{1.0}{
\Qcircuit @C=1.0em @R=1.0em @!R { \\
	 	\nghost{{q}_{0} :  } & \lstick{{q}_{0} :  } & \qw & \qw\\
	 	\nghost{{q}_{1} :  } & \lstick{{q}_{1} :  } & \qw & \qw\\
	 	\nghost{{q}_{2} :  } & \lstick{{q}_{2} :  } & \qw & \qw\\
\\ }}
\end{document}
